title: Engage & Earn
content: By being a part of InsurePro community, you can engage in various roles such as KYC Reviewer, Policy Reviewer, Adjuster, or Actuary to earn rewards.

title: Onboarding Cost
content: Onboarding gives you rights to the assets of the platform and involves a one-off access fee of 3 USDC (~ $3.09).

title: InsurePro Credentials
content: To participate, completion of our InsurePro Credentials verification is necessary. If verification is unsuccessful, a portion of the access fee will be refunded.
